scripts.test:watch: nodemon -i test/output -x mocha --bail test/unit test/int test/func
scripts.test:coverage: nyc _mocha test/unit test/int && nyc report -r html && nyc check-coverage
scripts.release:test: set -uex; yarn test; npm version prerelease; npm publish --tag testing
scripts.release:patch: set -uex; git pull; rm -rf node_modules; yarn; yarn run test:coverage; npm version patch; git push; npm publish --access public; git push --tags
